XLSX Builder Module

class csp.build_xlsx_file.buildXFile(stickData, programNumber, jobNumber, dirPath, fileName=None)

A class used to build xls files in a format that a BROBO Semi-Automatic cold saw can interpret.

Variables:

  • stickData (list) – Individual stick data.

  • programNumber (int) – The program number.

  • jobNum (int) – The job number.

  • savePath (str) – The save path.

  • fileName (str) – (Optional) The file name.

  • author (str) – The author of the solution.

Dependencies:

  • xlsxwriter

  • os

  • re

buildSheet()

This method fully builds the Excel file.

setAuthor(author)

Used to set the author of the solution.

Parameters:

author (String) – Author Name
